00052 static const uint8_t Radio_Configuration_Data_Array[]  = \
00053                         RADIO_CONFIGURATION_DATA_ARRAY;

00055 /* Radio interrupt receive flag */
00056 static bool    ezradioIrqReceived = false;

00076 /**************************************************************************/
00081 void ezradioInit( EZRADIODRV_Handle_t handle )
00082 {
00083   uint16_t wDelay;
00084 
00085   (void)handle;
00086 
00087   /* Initialize radio GPIOs and SPI port */
00088 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_PTI )
00089   ezradio_hal_GpioInit( GPIO_EZRadio_INT_IRQHandler, true );
00090 #else
00091   ezradio_hal_GpioInit( GPIO_EZRadio_INT_IRQHandler, false );
00092 #endif
00093   ezradio_hal_SpiInit();
00094 
00095   /* Power Up the radio chip */
00096   ezradioPowerUp();
00097 
00098   /* Load radio configuration */
00099   while (EZRADIO_CONFIG_SUCCESS != ezradio_configuration_init(Radio_Configuration_Data_Array))
00100   {
00101     /* Error hook */
00102 #ifdef ERROR_HOOK
00103     ERROR_HOOK;
00104 #else
00105     printf("ERROR: Radio configuration failed!\n");
00106 #endif
00107     for (wDelay = 0x7FFF; wDelay--; ) ;
00108 
00109     /* Power Up the radio chip */
00110     ezradioPowerUp();
00111   }
00112 
00113   /* Read ITs, clear pending ones */
00114   ezradio_get_int_status(0u, 0u, 0u, NULL);
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00118 /**************************************************************************/
00125 Ecode_t ezradioPluginManager( EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle )
00126 {
00127   /* EZRadio response structure union */
00128   ezradio_cmd_reply_t radioReplyData;
00129   EZRADIODRV_ReplyHandle_t radioReplyHandle = &radioReplyData;
00130 
00131   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00132   {
00133     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00134   }
00135 
00136   /* Check is radio interrupt is received. */
00137   if (ezradioIrqReceived)
00138   {
00139     /* Accept interrupt before clearing IT in the radio, so prevent race conditions. */
00140     ezradioIrqReceived = false;
00141 
00142     /* Read ITs, clear all pending ones */
00143     ezradio_get_int_status(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, radioReplyHandle);
00144 
00145 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_TRANSMIT )
00146     ezradioHandleTransmitPlugin( radioHandle, radioReplyHandle );
00147 #endif
00148 
00149 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_RECEIVE )
00150     ezradioHandleReceivePlugin( radioHandle, radioReplyHandle );
00151 #endif
00152 
00153 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_CRC_ERROR )
00154     ezradioHandleCrcErrorPlugin( radioHandle, radioReplyHandle );
00155 #endif
00156 
00157   }
00158 
00159   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00160 }

00162 /**************************************************************************/
00165 void ezradioResetTRxFifo(void)
00166 {
00167 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_RECEIVE )
00168   ezradio_fifo_info(EZRADIO_CMD_FIFO_INFO_ARG_FIFO_RX_BIT, NULL);
00169 #endif //#if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_RECEIVE )
00170 
00171 #if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_TRANSMIT )
00172   ezradio_fifo_info(EZRADIO_CMD_FIFO_INFO_ARG_FIFO_TX_BIT, NULL);
00173 #endif //#if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_TRANSMIT )
00174 }

00178 /**************************************************************************/
00181 static void ezradioPowerUp(void)
00182 {
00183   /* Hardware reset the chip */
00184   ezradio_reset();
00185 
00186   /* Initialize ustimer */
00187   USTIMER_Init();
00188   /* Delay for preconfigured time */
00189   USTIMER_Delay( RADIO_CONFIG_DATA_RADIO_DELAY_AFTER_RESET_US );
00190   /* Deinit ustimer */
00191   USTIMER_DeInit();
00192 }
00193 
00194 /**************************************************************************/
00197 static void GPIO_EZRadio_INT_IRQHandler( uint8_t pin )
00198 {
00199   (void)pin;
00200 
00201   /* Sign radio interrupt received */
00202   ezradioIrqReceived = true;
00203 }
